Accelerated Data Analysis using Pandas-Profiling

# Introduction We show here how we can accelerate data analysis using [Pandas-Profiling](https://pandas-profiling.github.io/pandas-profiling/docs/). ## Dataset As an application, we are using House Sales in King Country, USA dataset. We will apply Pandas-Profiling to this dataset. ## Method After loading the packages and the data, we just apply pandas_profiling.ProfileReport to the dataset. This will generate the profiling report (see below).
